item.title: Migration of Etcd to Masters for OpenShift 3.9 to 3.10 Upgrade
item.description: As of OpenShift Container Platform 3.10 etcd is expected to run in static pods on the master nodes in the control plane. You may have a deployed an HA cluster with dedicated etcd nodes managed with systemd. How do you migrate the this new architecture?
